title: We are looking for an experienced Remote Google Ads & Meta Ads Account Manager to help manage our digital advertising ef
job_overview:
We are looking for an experienced Remote Google Ads & Meta Ads Account Manager to help manage our digital advertising efforts.
Send your CV: Upgrade to see actual info

Compensation: $3000 - $5000/month depending on experience

Key Responsibilities:

Manage Google Ads and Meta Ads campaigns from start to finish.

Provide regular performance reports.

Optimize ad campaigns for better performance.

Requirements:

Minimum 1 year experience running ads on either platform.

Excellent communication skills.

Ability to work independently.
